name: Internal Bleeding
description: '''Internal Bleeding''' is an American [[death metal]] band formed in [[Long Island]], [[New York (state)|New York]] in 1991. As a part of New York's death metal scene, the band pioneered the genres of [[slam death metal]] and [[brutal death metal]] alongside [[Suffocation (band)|Suffocation]] and Pyrexia. Prior to their disbandment in 2005, Internal Bleeding released four studio albums, and went through an extensive number of lineup changes. Since their 2011 reunion, they have released three additional studio albums.
